projects.title: Deals Mate
projects.category: Dealsmate is an online marketplace that allows users to create and follow shopping lists that notifies them when items are on sale.

projects.title: Cooking Fever
projects.category: The objective of the player is to collect the ingredients to advance to next level. Further, the player can dodge enemies to gain score.

projects.title: EMR App
projects.category: Under Construction) An emergency application for patient to get treatment by finding nearest hospital. Additionally, the application shows the minimum wait time for the patient to get examined.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
